stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,由ist+ic构成,表示"具有……的"; 2. 表示名词"学科"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ant=anti反对+agon斗争+istic具有……的→adj.反对的,敌对的

stat站+istic学科+s→站着[静态]的学科→统计

Sentence.sentence: It is the source of all artistic work.
His artistic work has been well received.

Boys at single-sex schools were said to be more likely to get involved in cultural and artistic activities that helped develop their emotional expressiveness, rather than feeling they had to conform to the "boy code" of hiding their emotions to be a "real man".
You can prepare for a negotiation quite scientifically, but the execution of the negotiation has quite a lot to do with one's artistic quality.
But the artistic part of negotiation I think has to do with responding immediately to cues one gets in the process of negotiation
This is where the artistic quality comes in.
